subject: junit.jar - attempt to make a modification, Internal Error
msgSnippet: My goal is to replace one of the class files in junit.jar with a file containing a minor modification. Every attempt to modify or reconstruct the junit.jar
messageBody:
My goal is to replace one of the class files in junit.jar with a file
containing a minor modification.

Every attempt to modify or reconstruct the junit.jar file has
resulted in the error below. I have created a standalone "custom"
jar file to run in conjuntion with junit.jar without any problems.

My last attempts to deal with the junit.jar file was to extract the
contents of junit.jar (jar xf junit.jar) and reconstruct a junit.jar
from the original contents (jar cf junit.jar .). The last effort was
to recompile the class files from the src.jar file. Both,
reconstructing or recreating the junit.jar has failed with the
following message when I attempt to use it via ant.

Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

Regards,
Harold Rudolf


compile_src:

Compiling 1 source file to C:\projects\... .
An exception has occurred in the compiler (1.3.0). Please file a bug
at the Java Developer Connection (http://java.sun.com/cgi-
bin/bugreport.cgi). Include your program and the following
diagnostic in your report. Thank you.
